other_tests.procedure_name: Serologic Testing for H. pylori Infection

other_tests.findings: Nonobstructive bowel-gas pattern; moderate-to-abundant amount of stool, particularly in the ascending colon; normal distribution of bowel gas and no evidence of abnormal mass effect or intraabdominal calcifications.

other_tests.procedure_name: Complete Blood Count and Biochemical Tests
other_tests.date: One month later from initial visit
One month later from previous visit

other_tests.findings: Well-defined, homogeneously hyperenhancing, round mass in the left upper quadrant, consistent with an accessory spleen.
Consistent with a reparative process consisting of organizing hemorrhage and fibrosis, with neovascularization.
